title: Elizabeth Ann Hodges
content:
Share article  
  HODGES Elizabeth Ann (known as Ann) Of Warmstry Court Died peacefully at Worcestershire Royal Hospital on August, 22nd 2015, aged 77 years. A loving stepmum, gran, great gran, auntie, godmother and a dear friend to many. She is survived by two elder Sisters and one younger Brother. Funeral Service will take place at Worcester Crematorium on Wednesday, September 9th, at 2.30 p.m. Family flowers only please. Donations, if desired for the Midlands Air Ambulance, may be left in the collection box available at the Service, or sent by cheque only made payable to the charity to. The Co-operative Funeralcare 17 Lowesmoor, Worcester. WR1 2RS
